review: Great. Very easy to use and set up.
author: Debbie

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick does what it is supposed to do.  The instructions were not good, or clear, for a non-tech person such as myself.  I only got so far with the set-up and couldn't figure out how to get my TV to be "connected" to my Wifi.  I was hoping as soon as I connected the Amazon Fire TV Stick it would work, but it did not and it was not clear to me what to do next!  Thankfully my son and daughter-in-law stopped by to get it running and all is good!  Now I hope to check out what is available through Amazon so I can determine if it is worth the money I have to pay in addition to the exorbitant fee that I pay to Comcast for cable TV!
author: S. Boucher

review: I bought it only for Kodi and it is good device and connects very fast. Only problem I have noticed it is there is no way to exit from Fire stick. Push Play/Pause button for 15 sec is not working and it does not exit the device.
author: Ritesh

review: Since I received my Fire TV Stick, I've only watched regular television one time. I'm finding myself hurrying through work so I can get back to see what's happened to Mr. Selfridge and while I am working in my house, I can play the music from my playlist so that it's heard all over. This is one of the best items I've purchased in a long long time and I'm eager to continue to discover what all it can do. I've just scratched the surface.
author: Southern Lady "Cheryl"

review: We're very pleased with the Fire TV stick and Amazon's library of content. We're considering purchasing another one for our living room TV.
